title: FRIDAY 4/16 - PATRIOTS DRAFT PLANS
itunes:title: FRIDAY 4/16 - PATRIOTS DRAFT PLANS
description:
The NFL draft less than 2 weeks away and the Patriots hold the 15th overall pick. Head coach Bill Belichick (0:09) spoke to reporters Thursday and discussed their game plan going into the draft. Pass rusher Aldon Smith (1:23) headed to the Emerald City, while Cordarrelle Patterson (1:38) joins the Falcons. Voluntary offseason workouts begin Monday, but several teams choosing not to participate (1:53), and the NFL with a monumental announcement (3:11) when it comes to sports betting

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
